verbs.description: [ARG0: Nigerian President Buhari] [V: takes] [ARG1: the fifth] [ARGM-TMP: when asked to respond to Trump 's offensive remarks towards African nations] .
[ARG2: Nigerian President Buhari] takes the fifth [ARGM-TMP: when] [V: asked] [ARG1: to respond to Trump 's offensive remarks towards African nations] .
[ARG0: Nigerian President Buhari] takes the fifth when asked to [V: respond] [ARG1: to Trump 's offensive remarks towards African nations] .
